name: Pletris
description:
Games Factory Jam Details:

Main Theme: Solar System
Secondary Theme: Two Button Controls
Tertiary Theme: Puzzle

Controls:
A or Left Arrow: Move planet left
D or Right Arrow: Move planet right

Goal:
Fill lines to collect planets, similar to tetris, only the whole planet gets removed on line completion. Win by collecting all the planets. Lose if you can't move the next planet at the start.
